summary: When martial arts expert-and-cop John Keller infiltrates death row to uncover the truth behind the execution of several inmates, he joins the ranks of prisoners forced to fight in battles staged for pleasure by a sadistic Warden.
cast: Daniel Bernhardt|Ivan Ivanov|Lisa Stothard|Stefanos Miltsakakis|Jeff Moldovan|Michael Krawic|Derek McGrath|David Rowe|Elvis Restaino|Dennis LaValle|Mike Kirton|Christine Marais|Mitko Kiskinov|Carla Rahal|Linda Kouleva|Stefan Valdobrev|Daniel Jordanov|Ventzislav Dimitrov|Danila Perov|Nikolai Binev|Velichka Gaideva|Rudy Daykov|Svetoslav Stefanov|Sasho Ivanov|Simeon Daskaloff|Valentine Detrov|Mariana Zaharieva|Todor Madolev|Emil Sokolov|Cyril Todorov|Vesselin Shoumantov|Spas Stefanov|Tihomir Iliev|Rossen Petrov|Rositza Chorbadjiska|Snezana Philipova|Alexandra Zaharieva|Kalina Dimitrova|Kristina Semkova|Vanya Stoyanova|Desislava Andreeva|Veska Vassileva|Neli Nikolova|Krasimir Simeonov|Alexander Podikov|Peter Guslekov|Georgi Nikolov|Bojidar Dermendjiev
title: Bloodsport: The Dark Kumite
